settings.heading: Get the Latest News
settings.subheading: Subscribe to get the latest special offers and Cablesmiths news.

settings.promo_paragraph: Looking for a custom cable? Click here to design your own professional cable with our customiser app to any length with the largest range of cable colours, connectors, Techflex braid and custom logos available in Australia!

settings.banner_heading: Custom Microphone, Guitar, Speaker, Ethernet and Video Cables
settings.banner_paragraph: High quality custom cables for musicians, studios, schools, installations and production companies!

settings.richtext__usp_block1: We manufacturerÂ and dispatch orders within 1-5 business days
settings.richtext__usp_block2: Free standard shipping with tracking Australia wide for orders over $100
settings.richtext__usp_block3: All cables are manufactured in Western Australia to the highest quality standards

settings.second_text: Low shipping rates for - NZ, USA, UK & CANADA!

settings.main_heading: Low noise guitar and microphone cables in a variety of standard and custom options!
settings.block_paragraph:
Cablesmiths offer the most extensive range of customisable guitar cables from great brands such as Canare GS-6, Sommer LLX, Mogami and Gotham Ultra Pro terminated with silver solder for maximum strength and conductivity.

We specialise in rugged and reliable microphone cables and balanced interconnects in any length for stage and recording studio applications!

settings.main_heading: Analog and Digital Multicore and Stagebox Systems for Pro Audio
settings.block_paragraph: We custom build multicore cables, fanouts and stageboxes for production companies utilising MIL-C-5015 spec round multipin connectors. All our products are ruggedized to withstand the toughest conditions and can be branded or engraved with your company details at no additional cost.

Cablesmiths heatshrink printing offers the ability to print high resolution 600dpi logos, text, images and business information on nine heatshrink colours in fifteen ink colours.

We offer this as a commercial service for the biggest projects to individual clients looking to differentiate their cables to a high degree of professionalism and prestige that will stand out from the rest.

Heatshrink logos are included free for production companies and cables designed in our custom cable builder with an uploaded design!

Contact us to arrange a commercial sample!

settings.banner_text:
Cablesmiths is a specialist manufacturer of professional audio, video, ethernet and loudspeaker cables and stagebox systems. Our products are made in Perth, Western Australia and are used by professional musicians, production companies, recording studios, installations, churches and educational institutions.

We carry an extensive range of cable stock, connectors and accessories that allow us to offer custom cables in the widest range of colours and configurations to meet your needs and specifications.

To give clients full access to our customisation options through a simple and intuitive experience, we created our custom cable builder app from the users perspective. The app gives users the ability to visually design cables in real time without the need for any technical knowledge or doubts on what the finished cable will look like.

The app lets you customise cable length, connector brands and colours, custom heatshrink logos, Techflex braid and long life cables ties in various colours.

settings.promo_paragraph: Choose your cable length. Customise your connectors. Add your logo!
